summary: "Animals" is a rock album by Pink Floyd, released in 1977. It was made at their new studio in London and is about the political and social problems in Britain at the time. The album has long songs, like their earlier works, and the cover shows an inflatable pig between two chimneys. No singles were released, but they promoted it with a tour. The album reached high ranks in the UK and US charts and is now considered one of their best works.
title: Animals (Pink Floyd album)
